extendedInfo.description: Every subject casts a shadow in light, and the shadow of the same thing looks amazingly different by change of the light. Are you able to position the toy correctly to match its shadow?- Simply drag the toy to rotate it, 90 degrees as a move; see how many moves you take to position it correctly.- 3D vision of a lot fun toys, many levels awaiting;- Three play modes, free style, classic and action, from the relaxing to the challenging;- A quick relax, perfect time-killing for any short breaks.

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: This is a really good game and iam really enjoying it. Its great fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Unresponsive. Doesn\'t turn in the direction I select. Not intuitive. You have to work out which way it\'s going to move in response to the direction you swipe. Doesn\'t move as you would expect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: It\'s alright - I am sure many other people might like it, but it is just not for me. The control is a little fustrating too. Uninstalling :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: The touch needs to be more fluid and sensitive, so that players can better maneuver the piece to fit. Otherwise, nice graphics, great concept. Galaxy Tab 2.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: Good execution. I like the game and think the idea is original even if it is not really for me or anyone else that spends forty plus hours a week working with 3d modeling software.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Giz
reviews.comment: It woz ok but found some levels quite difficult, really gets the mind working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stresses me!
reviews.comment: It\'s fun but sometimes I just can\'t find the solution and then the game jumps to the next item and doesn\'t let me keep trying and it\'s not a lot of time really... - that makes me stressed instead of relaxed. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very addicting
reviews.comment: Can\'t stop playing! My sister keeps telling me to get off and go to bed but it\'s impossible!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very addictive
reviews.comment: Once I started playing I couldn\'t stop, but it was only the same thing to do over and over...so I didn\'t want to play it no more; so I\'m uninstalling it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FUN
reviews.comment: Awesome fun game, in a way hard to figure out, but it runs perfectly. I recommend u download this game :)
reviews.author: Maritza Cruz

reviews.title: LyssaBabyGirrl<3
reviews.comment: Its A Very Fuun And Addicting Game Once You GeT The Hang Of it (: Youl Love it Trusstt Me Hunn!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply Great
reviews.comment: Simple idea, great application. A game that adult can play aling with their little ones!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good.
reviews.comment: Gets a little challenging especially if you try for 3 stars in less than a minute. Makes you think about the position of the objects and how they need to move to match the shadow.
reviews.author: Maria Gonzalez

reviews.title: Game it stink like a shunk
reviews.comment: Its stink. Not even a 4 year old would play it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Pretty cool game. Simple idea and a great way to waste some time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: If you haven\'t tried this game, you definitely need too:))))
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple fun
reviews.comment: Another great game by droidhen! Keep it up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Even though the shapes repeat, I still find this a amusing game. It really makes you think.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Totally Addictive!!!
reviews.comment: I love this game! It\'s easy to play and can have you spinning toys for hours on end. I especially love the fact that ANYONE can play it.  From my seven year old niece, to my 65yr old aunt. They both love this game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I usually find puzzle games boring but this is great ! The count down timer thing adds to the excitement. For those noobs who cant appreciate the app, you need to use your brain and not guess. P.s Is there an option to turn off the game music? I want to listen to my own music while playing it
reviews.author: A Google User
